titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Football Card Collection, circa 1990-1999 AR.0768
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Phillip Wadley

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Libraries, Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-11-19T09:55-0500

repository.corpname: University of Tennessee Libraries, Special Collections

did.abstract: This collection contains football trading cards depicting University of Tennessee Volunteers players as well as former players in their post-college football careers. The cards include players' statistics and facts. The cards were manufactured under different trading card series.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: The University of Tennessee started its first football season in 1891, and has been active in the sport for well over a century. UT has historically since then held one of the top 10 win-loss records in college football. UT competes currently in the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA), Football Bowl Subdivision (FBS), and South Eastern Conference (SEC). Called the Tennessee Volunteers, the team plays at Neyland Stadium. The team is currently coached by Butch Jones. Notable alumni include Peyton Manning, Johnny Majors, and Herman Hickman.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection remain with the creator. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Colletions are stored offsite, and a minimum of 24 hours is needed to retrieve these items for use. Researchers interested in consulting any of the collections are advised to contact Special Collections at special@utk.edu.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of Item], Football Card Collection, AR.0768. University of Tennessee Libraries, Knoxville, Special Collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains approximately 150 trading cards of UT or former UT football players from the 1990s. Most cards have listed statistics and facts about the players. The players included are shown playing for other teams in their post-college careers. Publishing companies include Topps, Pacifc, Donrus Playoff, UDC, Upper Deck, AAA Sports, and the NFL.
